TopicTitle: I would love some opinions on my second Cinematic!

Articles.Content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iEJqZEEXV-w


Hope you guys Enjoy! There are a few hiccups but still, ill improve over time
(Criticism Welcome! )

- Andrew
Welcome aboard... and awesome video! really enjoyed the Piano at the start
Its a lovely video but seems a bit too much like this video by nassault.

Yeah, I had this Idea that i thought was great but when i did some research on youtube I saw Nassult's stardust and i was just like ah crap. The reason i still carried on though was because this was mainly just for camera angles etc soon as this is my second KSP short

Very beautiful music which was coordinated very well with the visuals . . . also the addition of speech by the kerbalnauts adds a realism element (I did this myself in my latest Kermmunist Space Program video, glad to see that I'm not alone in this technique). If I can offer 1 suggestion : It's a little unclear to me what is actually going on . . . some explanation or background (in the form of a bit more mission control dialogue with the astronauts), would have made it clearer for me. Otherwise, very nice and enjoyable.
How did you get the circular solar panels?
